chapter.title: Access Control service user management client
chapter.para: The Access Control can be accessed to manage users with different clients:

listitem.para: A java client, which is described in this guide.

chapter.para: This chapter explains how to download, build and install the Access Control service java command line client to manage users. The software is java written and requires a java installation.

section.title: Access Control users management client build
section.screen: cd $MY_WORKING_DIR/ac/cadc-access-control-admin gradle build cd build/distributions/ tar -xvf cadc-access-control-admin-x.y.z.tar

section.title: Access Control users management client install and configuration
section.para: Check the CLASSPATH variable set in $MY_WORKING_DIR/ac/cadc-access-control-admin/build/distributions/cadc-access-control-admin-x.y.z/bin/cadc-access-control-admin
